feed.title: TUoS HPC Changelog
feed.subtitle: Keep yourself up to date with recent changes on the University of Sheffield HPC clusters.

entry.title: New software installed: Bowtie2 2.3.4.2
entry.content:
The software Bowtie2 has been installed on Bessemer. Bowtie2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences.

The documentation for the usage of this software can now be found at: https://docs.hpc.shef.ac.uk/en/latest/bessemer/software/apps/Bowtie2.html
entry.summary: The software Bowtie2 has been installed on Bessemer. Bowtie2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences.

entry.title: New software installed: STAR 2.7.6a
entry.content:
The software STAR (Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference) has been installed on Bessemer. STAR is a software for RNA sequence alignment. STAR aligns RNA-seq reads to a reference genome using uncompressed suffix arrays.

The documentation for the usage of this software can now be found at: https://docs.hpc.shef.ac.uk/en/latest/bessemer/software/apps/STAR.html
entry.summary: The software STAR (Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference) has been installed on Bessemer. STAR is a software for RNA sequence alignment. STAR aligns RNA-seq reads to a reference genome using uncompressed suffix arrays.

entry.title: Example Post 2
entry.content: Goat who moved my cheese queso. Cream cheese bocconcini hard cheese swiss swiss pecorino jarlsberg cream cheese. Croque monsieur stilton cut the cheese bavarian bergkase parmesan cream cheese cauliflower cheese parmesan. Melted cheese feta squirty cheese fondue boursin fromage frais melted cheese cheese slices. Paneer babybel lancashire.
entry.summary: Goat who moved my cheese queso. Cream cheese bocconcini hard cheese swiss swiss pecorino jarlsberg cream cheese. Croque monsieur stilton cut the cheese bavarian bergkase parmesan cream cheese cauliflower cheese parmesan. Melted cheese feta squirty cheese fondue boursin fromage frais melted cheese cheese slices. Paneer babybel lancashire.

entry.title: Example Post 1
entry.content: Bavarian bergkase when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy goat. St. agur blue cheese cheesecake cheesecake parmesan cream cheese red leicester cauliflower cheese cheese and biscuits. When the cheese comes out everybody’s happy pecorino camembert de normandie parmesan when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy red leicester cheese on toast boursin. Cheeseburger jarlsberg cheesy grin when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy lancashire cheddar cream cheese fondue. Macaroni cheese smelly cheese cheese slices.
entry.summary: Bavarian bergkase when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy goat. St. agur blue cheese cheesecake cheesecake parmesan cream cheese red leicester cauliflower cheese cheese and biscuits. When the cheese comes out everybody’s happy pecorino camembert de normandie parmesan when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy red leicester cheese on toast boursin. Cheeseburger jarlsberg cheesy grin when the cheese comes out everybody’s happy lancashire cheddar cream cheese fondue. Macaroni cheese smelly cheese cheese slices.

entry.title: Welcome to Changelog
entry.content: We have just launched this website. You will see HPC changelog updates here.
entry.summary: We have just launched this website. You will see HPC changelog updates here.
